2. Perform the PCA
Task: Write the code to perform PCA on the mtcars dataset.
Select only columns 1 through 7. Set scale = TRUE. Store the result in an object called my_pca.

3. Visualization and Interpretation
Now, use the biplot() function to visualize your results. Try changing the choices argument to look at PC1 vs PC3.

Mini-Quiz
Question: If you change scale = TRUE to scale = FALSE, which variable dominates the first Principal Component? Hint: Look at the variable units/variances.
